useCase.name: Manage Infrastructure

successEndConditions.condition: The infrastructure management system can access and process the compute request successfully.

useCase.trigger: actorName initiates a compute request for the cloudlet.

mainSequence.step: Actor actorName requests a cloudlet compute job through CLI by using the 'cloudlet-compute-request()' method.
CLI forwards the 'compute/request()' request to the cloudlet service for computation.
Actor actorName requests a compute job through the Web platform and,
Web forwards the same 'compute/request()' request to the cloudlet service.
